mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.LatLonException
mdException.label: Postal code format exception
mdException.description: Thrown when importing an invalid lat/lon coordinate
mdException.message: The latitude [{lat}] and longitude [{lon}] do not represent a valid coordinate

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.SridException
mdException.label: Postal code format exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a geometry not in the 4326 srid
mdException.message: All geometries must use the 4326 spatial reference system
